name: APS Mailbox
description: Mailbox for the Federated Postal Service of ARK.

name: Adobe Ceiling
description: A stable traditional adobe ceiling that insulates the inside from the outside, and doubles as a floor for higher levels.

name: Adobe Doorframe
description: A traditional brick wall that provides entrance to a structure.

name: Adobe Foundation
description: A foundation is required to build structures in an area. This one is made from sturdy adobe.

name: Adobe Wall
description: A brick-and-mortar wall that provides the most insulation the inside from the outside and separates rooms.

name: Adobe Windowframe
description: A traditional brick wall with a hole for a window.

name: Amarberry Juice
description: Amarberry juice made on the fruit press. Great for restoring your energy reserves!

name: Apiary
description: The best place to put bees. Provides honey and beeswax over time when bees are present.

name: Azulberry Juice
description: Azulberry juice made on the fruit press. Great for restoring your energy reserves!

name: Baked Bread Loaf
description: Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested.

name: Baked Honey Loaf
description: Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested.

name: Baker's Oven
description: Perfect for baking delicious edibles!

name: Barrel of Gunpowder
description: A very tempermental [sic] primitive explosive. Has a slight chance of misfiring.

name: BattleAxe
description: A mighty axe used for serious battles!

name: Beeswax
description: Natural wax produced by honey bees. A very effective binding agent with many uses.

name: Big Bonfire
description: The biggest and safest fire you can make. Requires a form of wood or crude oil as a fuel source.

name: Big Campfire
description: Perfect for cooking meat, staying warm, and providing light. Increased heat and light radius! Must use a form of wood as a fuel source.

name: Big Fence - Opening
description: Used for a long opening in the big wood fence tier. Snappable!

name: Big Fence - Post
description: Used as a post section in the big wood fence tier. Snappable!

name: Big Fence - Section
description: Used as a section in the big wood fence tier. Snappable!

name: Big Stone Fence
description: A big brick-and-mortar fence.

name: Bonemeal Fertilizer
description: Bonemeal is a mixture of finely and coarsely ground animal bones and slaughter-house waste products. It is mainly used as an organic fertilizer for plants.

name: Braggot Mead
description: Alcoholic mead made from honey and malt.

name: Brazier
description: Increased heating and light radius!

name: Brick
description: Soft clay that has been heated in a forge to make hard brick.

name: Brick Dinosaur Gateway
description: A massive brick-and-mortar gateway that can be used for penning up dinosaurs.

name: Brick Doorframe
description: A traditional brick wall that provides entrance to a structure.

name: Brick Wall
description: A brick-and-mortar styled wall that provides the most protection.

name: Brick Windowframe
description: A traditional brick wall with a hole for a window.

name: Candles
description: Perfect for cooking meat, staying warm, and providing light. Increased heat and light radius.

name: Cane Sugar
description: Refined sugar made from a sugarcane plant and boiling over a cauldron.

name: Canteen
description: Safely carries a sizable amount of water, and is reasonably lightweight.

name: Cashew Milk
description: Soft clay that has been heated in a forge to make hard brick.

name: Cauldron
description: Must contain basic fuel to light the fire. Put various ingredients with water in this to make soups, stews, and dyes.

name: Ceiling Lamp
description: This snappable hanging torch will attach to ceilings. This torch only uses oil and sparkpowder.

name: Cement Mixer
description: Before making cement structures, the cement must be mixed.

name: Chicken and Rice
description: A meal that is so filling, it reduces your hunger for a short period.

name: Cigarette
description: When you're having one of those days! Drastically reduces hunger but increses [sic] oxygen consumption. Effects last 30 minutes.

name: Clay
description: Clay that has been formed from grinding claystone and limestone on a handmill.

name: Concrete Ceiling
description: A stable traditional concrete ceiling that insulates the inside from the outside, and doubles as a floor for higher levels.

name: Concrete Dinosaur Gate
description: A large, reinforced wooden gate that can be used with a Gateway to keep dinosaurs in or out.

name: Concrete Foundation
description: A foundation is required to build in an area. This one is made from traditional concrete.

name: Concrete Pillar
description: Adds structural integrity to the area it is build {sic} on. Can also act as stilts for buildings on inclines.

name: Concrete Ramp
description: An inclined concrete floor for travelling up or down levels. Can also be used to make an angled roof.

name: Construction Table
description: Place materials along with blueprints in this to create tools.

name: Cooked Bacon
description: Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested. More effective than normal meat. Wild carnivores like this meat a lot.

name: Cooked Fish Fillet
description: A very nutritious fillet of fish.

name: Cooked Poultry
description: Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested. More effective than normal meat. Wild carnivores like this meat a lot.

name: Cooked Rice
description: Cooked Rice that can be combined with other consumables.

name: Cooked Spare Ribs
description: Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested. More effective than normal meat. Wild carnivores like this meat a lot.

name: Cooking Station
description: Used to convert raw resources into bakeable items!

name: Covered Wooden Cabinet
description: A wooden cabinet that's able to store a limited amount of items.

name: Cup of Coffee
description: This fresh cup of coffee refreshes your body like an oasis. Consume it to gain increased hyperthermic insulation, and slow your rate of food consumption. Effects last 15 minutes.

name: Cup of Malt
description: Made from dried barley and boiling water. Used for alcoholic beverages.

name: Cup of Tea
description: This fresh cup of tea refreshes your body like an oasis. Consume it to gain increased hyperthermic insulation, and slow your rate of water consumption. Effects last 15 minutes.

name: Cured Bacon
description: This bacon still needs to be put on an open fire before eating.

name: Deadfall Trap
description: Kills small creatures so they may be harvested.

name: Dried Barley
description: Barley that's been dried for the purpose of making malt!

name: Dried Tea Bags
description: Tea thats [sic] been dried. This crop can be harvested for a delicious drink, or combines with other ingredients to make recipes.

name: Dried Tobacco
description: May be rolled with a note. When you're having on [sic] of those days.

name: Dried Wheat
description: Harvested from a wheat plant and dried on a preserving hut. It can be used to make flour.

name: Dry Firewood
description: Wood specifically meant to burn in long lasting fires!

name: Feathered Stone Arrow
description: An advanced arrow with a flint arrowhead and feathers. If it doesn't break, you can recover your ammo.

name: Fermented Wine
description: Wine courage!! Consume it do deal increased melee damage, and gain extra stamina regen. Effects last 15 minutes.

name: Fermenting Barrel
description: Combine malt as fuel with various items to make fermented beverages.

name: Fillet and Bread
description: A meal that is so filling, it reduces your hunger for a short period.

name: Firewood Holder
description: Store bulk amounts of firewood and convert fresh firewood to dry firewood.

name: Fish Bait
description: Lure for the fishing trap.

name: Fish Trap
description: Immobilizes small fish to harvest for meat.

name: Flaming Arrow
description: A flaming arrow made to strike fear in the hearts of your foes.

name: Flintlock Pistol
description: This early aged pistol trades accuracy for flexibility.

name: Fresh Cement
description: Fresh cement that cen [sic] be formed into and used to build larger structures.

name: Fresh Dough
description: Fresh dough made from flour on the baking station.

name: Fresh Firewood
description: If this firewood is left to dry, it will have a longer burning time.

name: Fresh Sugar Juice Bucket
description: Sugar juice pressed on the sugar press. Must be used with cauldron to make sugar.

name: Fruit Press
description: Used to convert berries into juice. This juice may be combines with other resources or drank on its own for its nutritional value.

name: Glass
description: Glass that has been heated in a forge to make a clear surface.

name: Grape Juice
description: Grape juice made on the fruit press. Can be used to make wine.

name: Grindstone
description: This simple stone contraption can be used to grind resources into new substances.

name: Ground Cashew
description: Ground cashew can be used to make cashew milk. [sic]

name: Handmill
description: This simple stone contraption can be used to grind resources into new substances.

name: Honey
description: Sweet food made by bees foraging nectar from flowers. Bees must be kept in an apiary to produce honey.

name: Iron Ingot
description: Created by refining iron ore in a forge.

name: Jam of Amarberry
description: A jam of amarberry that has been preserved with sugar.

name: Jam of Azulberry
description: A jam of azulberry that has been preserved with sugar.

name: Jam of Mejoberry
description: A jam of mejoberry that has been preserved with sugar.

name: Jam of Tintoberry
description: A jam of tintoberry that has been preserved with sugar.

name: Lantern
description: An oil lantern used to place on a market stall for night-time vending!

name: Leather
description: A thick piece of skin, hacked from a dead animal then cured on a tanning rack.

name: Left-Sloped Lumber Wall
description: A sturdy wooden sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, seprarates [sic] rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

name: LongBow
description: Masters of the bow often became great conquerors. Requires arrows to fire.

name: Lumber Bench
description: A simpleand [sic] stylish wooden bench for group sitting.

name: Lumber Ceiling
description: A stable lumber ceiling that insulates the inside from the outside, and doubles as a floor for higher levels.

name: Lumber Chair
description: A simple wooden bench for solo sitting.

name: Lumber Dinosaur Gate
description: A large, reinforced wooden gate that can be used with a Gateway to keep dinosaurs in or out.

name: Lumber Dinosaur Gateway
description: A large lumber and stone gateway that can be used with a Gate to keep most dinosaurs in or out.

name: Lumber Door
description: A lumber door that provides entrance to a structure. Can be locked for security.

name: Lumber Doorframe
description: A lumber wall that provides entrance to a structure.

name: Lumber Foundation
description: A foundation is required to build structures in an area. This one is made from sturdy lumber.

name: Lumber Glass Ceiling
description: A stable glass ceiling that insulates the inside from the outside, and doubles as a floor for higher levels.

name: Lumber Glass Pane
description: A lumber wall that provides light.

name: Lumber Pillar
description: Adds structural integrity to the area it is built on. Can also act as stilts for buildings on inclines.

name: Lumber Ramp
description: A reinforced inclined lumber floor for traveling up or down levels.

name: Lumber Station
description: A station to convert wood longs to planks and beams.

name: Lumber Wall
description: A sturdy lumber wall that insulates the inside from the outside, seprarates [sic] rooms, and provides structural integrity.

name: Lumber Windowframe
description: A lumber wall with a hole for a window.

name: Market Stall
description: This market stall can travel with you. You may place trading crates that can be picked up. The stall itself can also be picked up.

name: Meat Preserving Shed
description: Burns sparkpowder at low temperatures to dehydrate food and kill bacteria. Keeps perishables from spoiling for a longer time.

name: Mejoberry Juice
description: Mejoberry juice made on the fruit press. Great for restoring your energy reserves!

name: Metal Hammer
description: A strong metal hammer primarily used for taming dinosaurs.

name: Metal Machete
description: A sharp metal machete used for harvesting specialized consumables.

name: Miner's Box
description: Bulk storage for stone, metal, flint, and ingots.

name: Modern Hanging Shelf
description: Store various items.

name: Modern Storage Shelf
description: Store bulk amounts of any item.

name: Modern Storage Shelf (Fiber)
description: Store bulk amounts of any item.

name: Modular Table
description: Place items on this sturdy table (M&P, Lantern)

name: Musket
description: This simple single-shot musket is highly accurate, but has a long reload time.

name: Natural Yeast
description: Made from dough at a baking station. Used for baking various goods.

name: Obsidian Arrow
description: Most deadly arrow to be crafted. Made from pure obsidian.

name: Obsidian Pickaxe
description: Used to collect specialized stone resources from rocks.

name: Obsidian Spear
description: A dangerous melee weapon made out of obsidian that can also be thrown. Has a chance to break when used.

name: Oil Tank
description: A large machine that stores large amounts of oil.

name: Organic Oil (from fat)
description: Oil made from heating animal fat. Less dense than oil harvested from the sea.

name: Organic Oil (from seeds)
description: Oil made from grinding plant seed. Less dense than oil harvested from the sea.

name: Pitchfork
description: An easily made melee weapon that can also be thrown. Has a chance to break when used. Slightly more damage than a spear.

name: Pontoon Bridge
description: A primitive floating bridge that can be placed in water.

name: Preserving Campfire
description: A primitive way of preserving meat and drying crops. Must use sparkpowder or a form of oil as a fuel source.

name: Prime Salad
description: A meal that is so filling, it reduces your hunger for a short period.

name: Primitive Grill
description: Perfect for cooking meat in bulk, staying warm, and providing light. Must use crude oil as a fuel source.

name: Reinforced Glass Door
description: A reinforced glass door that provides entrance to structures. Can be locked for security.

name: Reinforced Glass Window
description: Reinforced glass window covering to provide protection from projectiles and spying.

name: Right-Sloped Lumber Wall
description: A sturdy lumber sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, seprarates [sic] rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

name: Rowboat
description: A floating wooden platform that you can pilot across the water. Can support the weight of structures and be built on.

name: Sack of Flour
description: Refined flour made from wheat and a handmill.

name: Sailboat
description: A boat you can pilot across the water. Faster than your average raft.

name: Salad
description: A meal that is so filling, it reduces your hunger for a short period.

name: Salt
description: Refined salt made from crystal and a grain wheel.

name: Simple Hammock
description: Thatch may not make the most comfortable mattress, but this bed acts as a respawn point for you and your Tribe.

name: Sloped Brick Wall Left
description: A sturdy brick sloped wall that provides protection. Used in conjuction with the roof.

name: Sloped Brick Wall Right
description: A sturdy brick sloped wall that provides protection. Used in conjuction with the roof.

name: Sloped Cement Roof
description: An inclined cement roof. Slightly different angle than the ramp.

name: Sloped Glass Roof
description: An inclined glass roof. Slightly different angle than the ramp.

name: Sloped Lumber Glass Wall Left
description: A sturdy lumber sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

name: Sloped Lumber Glass Wall Right
description: A sturdy lumber sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

name: Sloped Lumber Roof
description: An inclined lumber roof. Slightly different angle than the ramp.

name: Small Stone Fence
description: A small brick-and-mortar fence.

name: Smokehouse
description: Burns sparkpowder at low temperatures to dehydrate food and kill bacteria. Keeps perishables from spoiling for a long time.

name: Steel Handrail
description: A sturdy steel handrail for decorative purposes.

name: Steel Ingot
description: Created by refining iron ore and carbon in a forge.

name: Steel Pillar
description: This steel-plated concrete pillar adds structural integrity to the area it is build [sic] under. Can also act as stilts for buildings on inclines.

name: Steel Safebox
description: A steel box to store valuables in.

name: Steel Water Tower
description: Attach this to pipes to store rain, irrigation, or manually deposited water for later use. Will automatically irrigate nearby crops if attached to a tap. Stores a large amount of water!

name: Stimbull Juice
description: Stimbull juice made on the fruit press. The best drink for restoring your energy reserves!

name: Stone Hunting Knife
description: Used for gaining extra hide.

name: Storage Barrel
description: A small barrel to store goods in.

name: Table Lantern
description: An oil lantern used to place on a modular table night-time light!

name: Tanning Rack
description: Use salt and hide to make leather!

name: Teepee
description: Like a bed, this will allow your tribe a universal spawn point. But unlike a bed, no foundation required [sic]

name: Tintoberry Juice
description: Tintoberry juice made on the fruit press. Great for restoring your energy reserves!

name: Tomato Juice
description: Tomato juice made on the fruit press. Great for restoring your vitality!

name: Trading Crate
description: A small box to trade goods in.

name: Trading Crate (Bread)
description: A small box to trade goods in.

name: Trading Crate (Eggs)
description: A small box to trade goods in.

name: Trading Crate (Fruits & Veggies)
description: A small box to trade goods in.

name: Trap Bait
description: Lure for the deadfall trap.

name: Tudor Bar
description: A wooden bar to enjoy drinks with friends!

name: Tudor Bar (L Shaped)
description: A wooden bar to enjoy drinks with friends!

name: Viking Axe
description: A mighty battle axe wielded by the toughest of foes.

name: Water Well
description: Stores large amounts of rain water for later use. Cannot be attached to irrigation systems.

name: Weapon Rack
description: Store your weapons and tools!

name: Well Bucket
description: This bucket is used like a tap to gain access to a Water Well.

name: Well Chain
description: A chain to attach to a well for fetching water.

name: Wheat Beer
description: Beer muscles!! Consume it to deal increased melee damage, and gain extra stamina regen. Effects last 15 minutes.

name: Windmill
description: Mill your custom grains.

name: Wood Handrail
description: A sturdy lumber handrail for decorative purposes.

name: Wood Plank
description: Timber that is flat, elongated, and rectangular mainly used in construction.

name: Wood Storage Shed
description: Store bulk amounts of wood and thatch.

name: Wooden Arrow Sign
description: A simple wooden sign with an arrow for a landmark navigation or relaying messages.

name: Wooden Cabinet
description: A wooden cabinet that's able to store a limited amount of items.
